Hello there.  My name is DarkMouse.  I am new to this game.  I have role 
played many times in the past.  But nothing is quite like this.  I was just 
wondering, is this played my email or on the web site?
I do not have java capabilities on my comp and can not enter into the chat 
room from this comp.

I was also wondering if someone would be kind enough to bring me up to date 
as to what is going on with the groups and how to participate by the email?

Thank you very much..
                    DarkMouse
